revised_title: In-depth Study of the Ganglia and Nerves of the Heart
tldr: The author, Robert Lee, presents a detailed analysis of the ganglia and nerves of the heart through a dissection of a young heifer's heart. He identifies ninety ganglia on the anterior surface and discusses their distribution and relation to blood vessels and muscular fibers. The study also highlights the role of nerves and ganglia in the heart's posterior surface and the accompanying drawings by Mr. West.
